backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor, serving as a placeholder backend canister with no exposed methods.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-generated report mapping implemented frontend features to files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of all major frontend files, likely used for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, light/dark theme color tokens, and shared UI variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and sets basic metadata and page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component controlling the step-by-step flow between landing, quiz, game intro, tapping game, and final message.
frontend/src/components/FloatingTapFeedb: Renders animated floating feedback text at tap coordinates during the tapping game.
frontend/src/components/HeartButton.tsx: Reusable heart-styled button component with gradient colors and animated hover/active states.
frontend/src/components/PetalOverlay.tsx: Displays an animated overlay of falling cherry blossom petals for visual flair during gameplay.
frontend/src/components/YesNoButtons.tsx: Provides styled Yes and No buttons for answering quiz questions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required for this application.
frontend/src/hooks/useTappingGame.ts: Custom hook managing the tapping mini-game logic, including timer, tap count, success, and failure states.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines CSS variables for light and dark themes, global typography/background styles, and custom keyframes and animation utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a cn() utility that merges conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and importing global styles.
frontend/src/steps/FinalMessageStep.tsx: A React step component that reveals a heartfelt anniversary message after a button click, with animated hearts and themed styling.
frontend/src/steps/GameIntroStep.tsx: Introduces a tapping mini-game with an animated character and instructions, transitioning to game start on user interaction.
frontend/src/steps/LandingStep.tsx: Landing screen displaying a title, couple image, introductory message, and a heart button to proceed to the next step.
frontend/src/steps/QuizStep.tsx: Implements a multi-question yes/no quiz with progress tracking, playful responses, and completion callback.
frontend/src/steps/TappingGameStep.tsx: Interactive tapping game step that tracks taps and time, shows visual feedback and animations, and displays success or failure results.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, custom theme colors via CSS variables, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the overall project vision and state for a romantic multi-step single-page website, including schema/version metadata and a high-level summary of the experience. Lists detailed existing feature specifications covering the landing page, yes/no quiz, chibi dino mini-game, tapping game mechanics, and final anniversary reveal.
